title: The metadata schema
description: Metadata schema for all types of objects

type.description: The type of the object of the data being returned.

attributes.description: Schema representing the metadata associated with objects

dcFormat.description: A string describing the technical format of the resource. IANA media type. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#dc:format

dcType.description: Type of object stored. Higher level than mediaType. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#dc:type

acDigitizationDate.description: Date (ISO 8601 Date/Time) the first digital version was created. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#ac:digitizationDate

xmpMetadataDate.description: Point in time (ISO 8601 Date/Time) recording when the last modification to metadata (not necessarily the media object itself) occurred. Automaticaly set. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#xmp:MetadataDate

createdBy.description: Reference to the person who created the object.

uploadedBy.description: Reference to the person who uploaded the object.

acHashFunction.description: The cryptographic hash function used to compute the value given in acHashValue. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#ac:hashFunction

acHashValue.description: Hash of the uploaded object. Automaticaly generated on successful file upload. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#ac:hashValue

dcRights.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#dc:rights

managedAttributes.description: List of key/value pairs of managed attributes.

unmanagedAttributes.description: List of key/value pairs of unmanaged attributes.

acDerivedFrom.description: A URL that points to a meta data object that this meta derived from, such as a thumbnail. https://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/Audubon_Core_Term_List#ac:derivedFrom
